bioAsHtml: I had been involved in various data intensive fields (algo trading, machine learning & AI). I have gained experience in data intelligence for entrepreneurial boutiques, start up and big ones. I also co-organize meetings devoted to predictive analytics for business (6,500+ academic researchers, startup entrepreneurs, innovators and geeks)

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
